video.title: The Life of Birds
video.synopsis: Researchers traverse the globe, exploring 42 countries and examining more than 300 species of birds in David Attenborough's lively documentary series.

episodes.synopsis: Computer graphics recreate the period 150 million years ago when small, fast-running dinosaurs evolved feathers and took to the air.
episodes.title: To Fly or Not to Fly

episodes.synopsis: David Attenborough examines how birds have adapted to the air and perfected the skills needed to fly, despite the inherent dangers of flight.
episodes.title: The Mastery of Flight

episodes.synopsis: Birds have evolved a range of bills designed to hammer grubs from trees, extract tiny fruit seeds, and sip nectar from the deep recesses of flowers.
episodes.title: The Insatiable Appetite

episodes.synopsis: From meat-eating parrots in New Zealand to huge eagles that catch monkeys and flamingoes in Africa, a look at the dramatic hunting methods of birds.
episodes.title: Meat-Eaters

episodes.synopsis: A look at the fishing techniques of birds including common mallards, talented divers prying creatures from under rocks in Yellowstone National Park.
episodes.title: Fishing for a Living

episodes.synopsis: The significance of various bird songs and signals reveals why making loud sounds in the rain forest achieves a whole lot more than just noise.
episodes.title: Signals and Songs

episodes.synopsis: How male birds use strange displays and rituals in order to turn a female's head, and how for many species it's girl power that rules the dating game.
episodes.title: Finding Partners

episodes.synopsis: The extraordinary variety of ways in which birds from all over the world construct their nests and protect their eggs from predators.
episodes.title: The Demands of the Egg

episodes.synopsis: Sweeping through a range of species, including pelicans, sea eagles, babblers, and finch chicks, a study of the ways in which birds parent.
episodes.title: The Problems of Parenthood

episodes.synopsis: Exploring the evolution and behavior of birds by looking at how birds cope with living in some of the harshest and most bizarre places on the planet.
episodes.title: The Limits of Endurance
